name: ReplaceDeviceStep

properties.name: context
properties.description: !Internal use only! Stores the context the step was initially executed with.
properties.rawdescription: !Internal use only! Stores the context the step was initially executed with.

properties.name: label
properties.description: Label to be used in the replace device wizard UI.
properties.rawdescription: Label to be used in the replace device wizard UI.

properties.name: overrideContext
properties.description: Defines if the result from step execution should be passed to the next step in the flow.
properties.rawdescription: Defines if the result from step execution should be passed to the next step in the flow.

properties.name: seed
properties.description: !Internal use only! Context to be used for step re-trial.
properties.rawdescription: !Internal use only! Context to be used for step re-trial.

properties.name: skip
properties.description: !Internal use only! Flag to skip step execution, used to control retrial.
properties.rawdescription: !Internal use only! Flag to skip step execution, used to control retrial.

properties.name: state
properties.rawdescription: Current execution state of the step.

description: Declares an execution step in the device replacement flow.
rawdescription: Declares an execution step in the device replacement flow.
